item.title: Equip armor as wepon?
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

[quote=“P 16, post:6, topic:257148”][quote author=zofis7 link=topic=339529.msg2632601#msg2632601 date=1232288275]

[quote author=Digital Hotdogs link=topic=339529.msg2632567#msg2632567 date=1232284856]

i dont really now sorry 1st post!!! if i know how i,ll come here and ask kk?
[/quote]If you don’t know don’t post.
Try add the item ID’s to Items.java, and find where they belong. or something like that.

just like he said insert your id’s in item.java to where they belong if its a platebody put the id under platebody.
[/quote]or item4.java lol[/quote]Not all sources have the same item.java’s.

Read full topic
